DOC.brief_summary: Study of whether the investigational drug CE-326,597 improves glucose control and results in body weight loss in patients with type 2 diabetes
DOC.brief_title: A Trial In Diabetic Patients To Assess Effect Of CE-326,597 On Glucose Control And Body Weight
DOC.criteria: Patients with type 2 diabetes, not on any or on oral (up to 2) antidiabetic medications, otherwise medically stable. Women of childbearing potential, people with unstable medical conditions, people with gallstones
DOC.keyword: Phase 2A, safety and efficacy trial with CE-326,597 in patients with T2DM.
